main_definition: to come across or meet someone or something, often unexpectedly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To face a challenge or difficulty.
meanings_and_examples.example: During the hike, we encountered several steep climbs and rough terrain.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To meet someone for the first time in person.
meanings_and_examples.example: She had an encounter with her childhood friend while shopping at the mall.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have a brief interaction or experience, often involving new situations or experiences.
meanings_and_examples.example: Having encountered many different cultures during his travels, he was always open to learning more.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When an unexpected event happens while doing something else.
meanings_and_examples.example: While driving home from work, she encountered a deer crossing the road.
